quotes.text: Aleo very tsikalakalam-bola toy izay very tsikalakalam-pihavanana.
Ady amin' adala, ka ny handry no miala.
Mahagaga. F'eto an-tanindrazako aho nefa, tenin'olon-kafa, no takiana mba ho haiko vao mahazo anjara asa. Hamelomako ankohonana.
quotes.source: Mahagaga by Georges Ramananatena, aka RADO
